quest.name: Growing Pla Enni
journal:
 Quest Sync
Ose Sigun needs help growing mushrooms.
objectives: Slay an undine for its heart.
Slay a phooka for its blood.
Slay a psammead for its silk.
Deliver the items to Ose Sigun.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: Tell me, mortal─do you know what a “pla enni” is?

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: It's the name of not only our village, but a mushroom. A variety that is exceptionally difficult to grow.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: Some special items are needed in their cultivation, and I would be grateful if you could procure them for me.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: Specifically, what I require is an undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk. Suffice it to say, you'll be suitably rewarded for your troubles.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: An undine heart, a bottle of phooka blood, and a ball of psammead silk─these are the items needed to cultivate pla enni mushrooms. Please procure them for me.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: There you are. Were you able to obtain the items I requested?

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: Excellent! With these, we can ensure that the pla enni grow big and strong!

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: How do we use the items, you ask? We give the mushrooms water purified with the undine heart, and fertilize them with nutrient-rich phooka blood. And as they grow, we reinforce them with psammead silk.

dialogue.name: OSESIGUN
dialogue.text: Add some windows and doors, perhaps a flight of stairs, and it is ready to live in. My thanks, mortal. Here is your fitting reward.
